--- ### @mixin content-block Adds a margin bottom to element and removes the margin bottom from the last element in it's parent. #### Arguments | Name | Type | Default | Description | | ---- | ---- | ------- | ----------- | | `spacing` | `string` | `$line-height` | The amount of margin | | `location` | `string` | `bottom` | Can be either `bottom` or `top` | #### SCSS {% highlight css %} .foo { @include content-block; } {% endhighlight %} #### CSS {% highlight css %} .foo { margin-bottom: 24px; } .foo:last-child { margin-bottom: 0; } {% endhighlight %}
